subject: Hello my Dear Frinend,
body:
Hello my Dear Frinend,
My name is Mrs. Melinda Cruz . I am working with one of the prime banks here in Abidjan- Ivory Coast. in this bank existed a dormant account for many years, which belong to one of our late foreign customer.
The amount in this account stands at [$ 17,000,000.00]  USA Dollars) I will like to transfer the funds into your bank account, The percentage Ratio IS THUS: 40% for you, 60% for me and my colleagues, if you are interested contact me and all the
details shall be sent to you once I hear from you.
Best regards,
Mrs. Melinda Cruz

subject: Re: Hello my Dear Frinend,
body:
Hello Mrs. Melinda Cruz,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your message and would like to know more about this situation. Could you please provide more details? For instance, how did you find my contact information and why have you chosen me for this transaction?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Genevieve
